org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

接口 BackupAdmin

  • 所有超级接口:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    所有已知实现类:
    BackupAdminImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface BackupAdmin
extends Closeable
    The administrative API for HBase Backup. Construct an instance and call Closeable.close() afterwards.

    BackupAdmin can be used to create backups, restore data from backups and for other backup-related operations.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 方法详细资料

      • backupTables

        String backupTables(BackupRequest userRequest)
             throws IOException
        Backup given list of tables fully. This is a synchronous operation. It returns backup id on success or throw exception on failure.
        参数:
        userRequest - BackupRequest instance
        返回:
        the backup Id
        抛出:
        IOException

      • restore

        void restore(RestoreRequest request)
      throws IOException
        Restore backup
        参数:
        request - restore request
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • getBackupInfo

        BackupInfo getBackupInfo(String backupId)
                  throws IOException
        Describe backup image command
        参数:
        backupId - backup id
        返回:
        backup info
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • deleteBackups

        int deleteBackups(String[] backupIds)
           throws IOException
        Delete backup image command
        参数:
        backupIds - array of backup ids
        返回:
        total number of deleted sessions
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • mergeBackups

        void mergeBackups(String[] backupIds)
           throws IOException
        Merge backup images command
        参数:
        backupIds - array of backup ids of images to be merged The resulting backup image will have the same backup id as the most recent image from a list of images to be merged
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • getHistory

        List<BackupInfo> getHistory(int n)
                     throws IOException
        Show backup history command
        参数:
        n - last n backup sessions
        返回:
        list of backup info objects
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • getHistory

        List<BackupInfo> getHistory(int n,
                            BackupInfo.Filter... f)
                     throws IOException
        Show backup history command with filters
        参数:
        n - last n backup sessions
        f - list of filters
        返回:
        list of backup info objects
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • listBackupSets

        List<BackupSet> listBackupSets()
                        throws IOException
        Backup sets list command - list all backup sets. Backup set is a named group of tables.
        返回:
        all registered backup sets
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • getBackupSet

        BackupSet getBackupSet(String name)
                throws IOException
        Backup set describe command. Shows list of tables in this particular backup set.
        参数:
        name - set name
        返回:
        backup set description or null
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • deleteBackupSet

        boolean deleteBackupSet(String name)
                 throws IOException
        Delete backup set command
        参数:
        name - backup set name
        返回:
        true, if success, false - otherwise
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • addToBackupSet

        void addToBackupSet(String name,
                    TableName[] tables)
             throws IOException
        Add tables to backup set command
        参数:
        name - name of backup set.
        tables - array of tables to be added to this set.
        抛出:
        IOException - exception

      • removeFromBackupSet

        void removeFromBackupSet(String name,
                         TableName[] tables)
                  throws IOException
        Remove tables from backup set
        参数:
        name - name of backup set.
        tables - array of tables to be removed from this set.
        抛出:
        IOException - exception
